attributes.action: We, the people, demand full public revelation of all governmental representatives use of tax avoidance schemes.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people of the United Kingdom have been made aware of the use of tax avoidance schemes by public figures and high earning individuals.
We demand that there is a full investigation into the last twenty years use of all known tax avoidance schemes by our governmental and parliamentary representatives. Including inheritance tax avoidance and accumulation of wealth that within the PAYE system would have been subject to specific taxation.
In the interest of transparency we also demand a publicly visible report to all UK citizens
